column3: â€œFunky looking dark green nugs with oversized finger-like calyxes and thick orange hairs. Smell is skunky and pungent, but less so that other examples of Lambâ€™s Bread, with undertones of citrus and haze. Smoke is smooth and pungent like the smell, with a defined sharpness similar to Jack Herer or Haze. Effects are felt quickly, with a heady, cerebral and soaring type head high. I felt extremely euphoric and giggly, ha...â€

â€œGot this from a dispensary in downtown Oakland. I like Sativas but am always a bit skeptical, as they vary a lot with me. Also I had tried Lambsbread before and was not impressed (Kings Bread is apparently a close relative). So getting this strain was a bit of a gamble.

But it was surprisingly good - I had a nice trippy time. Read on for the details:

The buds are tight and nice-looking with frosting, but not sp...â€

â€œKing's Bread is hybrid sativa dominate strain, which has a delectable taste.  Great sativa that will not induce anxiety, always a plus.  It even allows one to remain alert while feeling relaxed and euphoric.  This strain is also one of the grandparents of Bob Marley's Lamb's Bread.â€

â€œSuch a strong fresh lemon/citrus scent it is amazing, absolutely covered in trichomes so sticky, really nice for first thing in the a.m smoke, I definitely suggest this strain if you come across it.....and like sativas of course!!!!â€

â€œKings Bread: lineage is Lambs Bread that has been grown, left to flower and die, then regenerated back into vegative state and grown for a second season. Result is a much stronger plant but still an accourance of gardening technique.â€

â€œKing's Bread extract by GoldenXtrX is a great product. Smooth and mellow, the hits go down very easy. It has a strong flavor, earthy and a bit pungent it has a hint of lemon. This is one of my all time favorites. If you see it, buy it.â€
â€œGreat flavor, and great effects.  Always makes me feel happy and comfortable.â€

â€œA very energetic, thoughtful high. I smoke this regularly and get no fuzziness at all. Tight, conical buds with strong citrus and pine odors. Not the bud to couch-lock you. Makes me want to go for a walk!â€

â€œTook two hits off Magic-Flight; I'm relatively low-tolerance and that was too much, and I felt a little flattened - the good mental effects were there, but I was too weighed down to take advantage of them. Very optimistic, though, that a lower dosage would feel lighter and more energizing.â€

â€œAs a college student, I dont pick up sativa strains too often but something told me to venturr into the realm of sativas and I wasnt disappointed. MmmMmmMmmMMMMMm soo tasty. On exhale it tasted like sweet pine, silky smooth hit ğŸ‘Œ immediately I felt lighter, not physically or mentally" but in my SOULLLLL. beautiful. I can't comment on bud beauty because I got the end of the batch because the strain sold out way too ...â€"
â€œOne of my absolute favorites. Apparently it was bob marleys too. Hits pretty harsh, but u have to love itâ€
â€œOne of the best tasting strains I've ever smoked.. Enjoy this one if you find it!â€
â€œI bought King's Bread because of its high ranking in creative" effects
column4: and the other positive effects sounded great too: focused

column3: â€œVery clear headed sativa high. Mello and relaxed while having creative energy to simmer with. Great for anxiety. Listed at 18% THC. It's a unique high and smoke experience.â€

â€œThis strain has a great taste, one of the better ones I've vaped. The lingering headache is sort of irritating but overall, it's a pretty good high with an easy come down.â€
â€œTried this while in Jamaica. Very happy, giggly and partially hallucinating.â€
â€œThis strain (in my opinion) is a bit underground and not known. It's a gold mine if you find it!! So good!â€
